class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformDecompose
class.brief_description: <<<<<<< HEAD Decomposes a [Transform] into four [Vector3]s within the visual shader graph. ======= Decomposes a [Transform3D] into four [Vector3]s within the visual shader graph. >>>>>>> 5d9cab3aeb3c62df6b7b44e6e68c0ebbb67f7a45
class.description: Takes a 4x4 transform matrix and decomposes it into four [code]vec3[/code] values, one from each row of the matrix.
